<file path="source.swift">
import Foundation

protocol Describable:

class Point:
    var x: Int
    var y: Int
    var magnitude: Double
    var description: String

class Rectangle:
    var origin: Point
    var size: (width: Int, height: Int)
    var area: Int
    var description: String

class UIRectangle:
    var description: String
    func show():
        {
                isVisible = true
            }
    func hide():
        {
                isVisible = false
            }
</file>
